content.question: A force probe is used to push a box across a smooth surface, as shown in the figure. Frictional forces are considered to be negligible. The force probe collects data about the force exerted on the box as a function of time. The data are used to create the graph that is shown. During which time interval does the box experience the greatest change in its momentum?

choices.label: <math alttext="0 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>0</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="2 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="2 seconds " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="4 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="4 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="6 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>
The change in momentum is the same for each interval of time.

content.answer: <math alttext="4 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math> to <math alttext="6 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mstyle><mrow><mn>6</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
